text: <@UQWGKUEN7> that's a good idea I'll have a look now
<@U2H3TT8F2> I'm almost 100% certain the issue is related to mobile styles. When I remove mobile styling (eg: mobile column padding) the error goes away.
<@UFL9XN2DQ> Are you talking about these mobile styles? I just added a bunch of padding and margin all around on a custom module and a dnd column using this and it seems to still copy fine for me.
If you create a new page does the issue persist?
<@UFL9XN2DQ> you are on the right track, we are implementing fixes for this now.
Fix should be deployed now, let us know if you keep running into things!
<@U2H3TT8F2> the issue appears to be fully fixed on my side as well. I've been "copying as HubL" for the last 6 hours without issue. Thank you!
